mapper.select: SELECT YEAR FROM LECT_REGISTER WHERE STU_ID=#{stuId} AND STATUS='Y' GROUP BY YEAR ORDER BY YEAR DESC
SELECT SEMESTER FROM LECT_REGISTER WHERE STU_ID=#{stuId} AND STATUS='Y' GROUP BY SEMESTER ORDER BY SEMESTER

SELECT A.*, B.*, C.*, D.*, E.*, COUNTOBJ, COUNTEVAL FROM LECT_REGISTER A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN GRADE E ON A.STU_ID=E.STU_ID AND B.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE AND A.YEAR=E.GRADE_YEAR AND A.SEMESTER=E.GRADE_SEMESTER LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT lo.GRADE_NO, COUNT(DISTINCT lo.GRA_OBJ_NO) as "COUNTOBJ" FROM GRA_OBJECT lo WHERE lo.STU_ID=#{stuId} GROUP BY GRADE_NO) G ON G.GRADE_NO=E.GRADE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT le.LECT_REG_NO , COUNT(DISTINCT le.LECT_REG_NO) as "COUNTEVAL" FROM LECT_EVALUATE le WHERE le.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND le.STATUS='N' GROUP BY le.LECT_REG_NO) F ON A.LECT_REG_NO=F.LECT_REG_NO WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY A.YEAR DESC, A.SEMESTER DESC

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 THEN B.SUB_CREDIT ELSE 0 END) MAJORC, SUM(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN B.SUB_CREDIT ELSE 0 END) ELSEC, SUM(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 OR B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN B.SUB_CREDIT ELSE 0 END) ALLC, SUM(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 OR B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN E.GRADE_CREDIT ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 OR B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN E.GRADE_CREDIT ELSE 0 END) AVGCREDIT, SUM(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 OR B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN TO_NUMBER(E.GRADE_RESULT) ELSE 0 END)/COUNT(CASE WHEN B.SUB_DIVS=1 OR B.SUB_DIVS=2 THEN TO_NUMBER(E.GRADE_RESULT) ELSE 0 END) GRADERE FROM LECT_REGISTER A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN GRADE E ON A.STU_ID=E.STU_ID AND B.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE AND A.YEAR=E.GRADE_YEAR AND A.SEMESTER=E.GRADE_SEMESTER WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM LECT_REGISTER A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_CODE=B.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR C ON B.PROF_ID=C.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON B.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN GRADE E ON A.STU_ID=E.STU_ID AND B.SUB_CODE=E.SUB_CODE WHERE A.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND A.YEAR=#{year} AND A.SEMESTER=#{semester} AND E.GRADE_YEAR=#{year} AND E.GRADE_SEMESTER=#{semester} AND A.STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM GRA_OBJECT WHERE STU_ID=#{stuId} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRA_OBJECT(GRA_OBJ_NO,GRADE_NO, STU_ID, GRA_OBJ_DATE,TITLE,CONTENT, STATUS ) values(SEQ_GRA_OBJ_NO.NEXTVAL, #{gradeNo}, #{stuId}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{content}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GRA_OBJECT A LEFT JOIN GRADE B ON A.GRADE_NO=B.GRADE_NO LEFT JOIN SUBJECT C ON B.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR D ON C.PROF_ID=D.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT E ON C.DEPT_CODE=E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN LECT_REGISTER F ON C.SUB_CODE=F.SUB_CODE AND B.GRADE_YEAR=F.YEAR AND B.GRADE_SEMESTER=F.SEMESTER WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND F.STU_ID=#{stuId}

SELECT * FROM GRA_OBJECT A LEFT JOIN GRADE B ON A.GRADE_NO=B.GRADE_NO LEFT JOIN SUBJECT C ON B.SUB_CODE=C.SUB_CODE LEFT JOIN PROFESSOR D ON C.PROF_ID=D.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT E ON C.DEPT_CODE=E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN LECT_REGISTER F ON C.SUB_CODE=F.SUB_CODE AND B.GRADE_YEAR=F.YEAR AND B.GRADE_SEMESTER=F.SEMESTER WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND F.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND B.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND F.STATUS='Y' AND B.GRADE_YEAR=#{year} AND B.GRADE_SEMESTER=#{semester}

SELECT * FROM LECT_EVALUATE A LEFT JOIN LECT_REGISTER B ON A.LECT_REG_NO=B.LECT_REG_NO WHERE A.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND B.STU_ID=#{stuId} AND B.SUB_CODE=#{subCode} AND A.STATUS='N' AND A.YEAR=#{year} AND A.SEMESTER=#{semester} ORDER BY A.LECT_EVA_NO
